description: Long runs mean preparing for shifts in conditions. The Norvan Pant – light,  durable,  and packable –  combines transitional weather protection with breathable comfort and the performance of four-way stretch. Stow it in your pack,  or just pull them on for runs on cool,  damp days. The Fortius™ Air 50 nylon plain weave has a durable water repellent finish to help shed light precipitation. The tapered fit is streamlined,  the waistband is designed for all-day comfort,  and articulated patterning frees your stride.
name: Arcteryx Norvan Pants, Reg - Mens
